name: BITSHIFT OVERDRIVE ALPHA
description:
A colorful retro-style rhythm game, BITSHIFT OVERDRIVE sends the player barreling through a chiptune synthscape featuring music inspired by the SNES and Genesis soundfonts of the 16-bit era.

BITSHIFT OVERDRIVE is still in active development.

Follow BITSHIFT OVERDRIVE through my YouTube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCger890nioPNkKxM5Uotb-w

Thank you very much for playing!
